short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button to GitHub; when clicked, auto-comments '@Mergifyio queue' to manage tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button to GitHub; when clicked, auto-comments '@Mergifyio queue' to manage tasks. You should subscribe on https://mergify.com/ to have access to the Queue Manager
